***батюшка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:батюшка.html>ба́тюшка</a> (4263)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батя.html>ба́тя</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bátja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-юшка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-juška</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батюшка.html>ба́тюшка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bátjuška</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батюшка.html>ба́тюшки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батюшка.html>ба́тюшки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батюшка.html>ба́тюшек</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:obsolete.html>obsolete</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:father.html>father</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:parent.html>parent</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>Как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>вас</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:батюшка.html>ба́тюшке</a></b>?</i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:date.html>dated</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Kak vas <a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a> <b>bátjuške</b>?</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:what.html>What</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:your.html>your</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:patronymic.html>patronymic</a>?</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:father.html>father</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>term</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:address.html>address</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:priest.html>priest</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:priest.html>priest</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:батюшка.html>ба́тюшки</a></b> (<a href = vnd.unilang:мой.html>мои́</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:святой.html>свя́ты</a>)!</i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Bátjuški</b> (moí <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> svjáty)!</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:good.html>Good</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:gracious.html>gracious</a>! <a href = vnd.unilang:goodness.html>Goodness</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:me.html>me</a>!</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:dear.html>dear</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:friend.html>friend</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:boy.html>boy</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:respectful.html>respectful</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:affectionate.html>affectionate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>term</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:address.html>address</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:father.html>father</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:parent.html>parent</a>)</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:папа.html>па́па</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pápa</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:отец.html>оте́ц</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">otéc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батя.html>ба́тя</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">bátja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батька.html>ба́тька</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">bátʹka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:старик.html>стари́к</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">starík</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:старина.html>старина́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">stariná</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>term</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:address.html>address</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батенька.html>ба́тенька</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">bátenʹka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тюш<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-бат-</b>; суффикс: <b>-юшк</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***батя.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:батя.html>ба́тя</a> (6552)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">батѧ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">batę</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*batę</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>compare</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulgarian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Bulgarian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:bulgarian.html>Bulgarian</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="bg">баща́</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="bg-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">baštá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:alternatively.html>Alternatively</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*<a href = vnd.unilang:brat.html>brat</a>(<a href = vnd.unilang:r.html>r</a>)ъ</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батя.html>ба́тя</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bátja</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батя.html>ба́ти</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батя.html>ба́ти</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:батя.html>ба́тей</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тя</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 2a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-бат-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-я</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Italian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:italian.html>Italian</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="it">baule</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkic_languages" class="extiw" title="w:Turkic languages"><a href = vnd.unilang:turkic.html>Turkic</a></a></span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баул.html>бау́л</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">baúl</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баул.html>бау́ла</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баул.html>бау́лы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баул.html>бау́лов</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>у́л</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-баул-</b>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>у́л</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-баул-</b>.
</p>

***бах.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:бах.html>бах́</a> (6651)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection"><a href = vnd.unilang:interjection.html>Interjection</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бах.html>бах́</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bax</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>kaboom <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:sound.html>sound</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:explosion.html>explosion</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b></b>
</p><p>Звукоподражательное <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-бах-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:обозначать.html>обознача́ет</a> звукоподражание <a href = vnd.unilang:резкий.html>ре́зкому</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:низкий.html>ни́зкому</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:звук.html>зву́ку</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наподобие.html>наподо́бие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выстрел.html>вы́стрела</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:взрыв.html>взры́ва</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:баба.html>ба́бах</a>, бух, <a href = vnd.unilang:бац.html>бац</a></li>

</ol>
</body> 
***бахрома.html

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бахрома.html>бахрома́</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">baxromá</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бахрома.html>бахромы́</a></b>, <i>uncountable</i>)

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>хро<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ма́</b>

Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> мн. ч. предположительны <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> неупотребимы.

***бахча.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:бахча.html>бахча́</a> (23343)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:via.html>Via</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkic_languages" class="extiw" title="w:Turkic languages"><a href = vnd.unilang:turkic.html>Turkic</a></a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:source.html>source</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Persian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Persian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:persian.html>Persian</a></a></span> <i class="fa-Arab mention" lang="fa">باغچه</i> |  <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="fa-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bâğče</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бахча.html>бахча́</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">baxčá</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бахча.html>бахчи́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бахча.html>бахчи́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бахча.html>бахче́й</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:garden.html>garden</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:field.html>field</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:plantation.html>plantation</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:watermelon.html>watermelons</a>, melons <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> pumpkins</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:бах.html>бах́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ча́</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 4b  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-бахч-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="сельскохозяйственное"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a>.-х.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:пол.html>по́ле</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́ром</a> выращиваются <a href = vnd.unilang:арбуз.html>арбу́зы</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:дыня.html>ды́ни</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тыква.html>ты́квы</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:май.html>ма́е</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:когда.html>когда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вернувшийся.html>верну́вшиеся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пахота.html>па́хоты</a> гнадентальцы засаживали <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:бахча.html>бахчи́</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:дыня.html>ды́нями</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:арбуз.html>арбу́зами</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тыква.html>ты́квами</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:огород.html>огоро́ды</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дом.html>дома</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:картофель.html>карто́фелем</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:бах.html>Бах́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> Кларой <a href = vnd.unilang:читать.html>чита́ли</a> Гëте <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Г</a>. Яхина, «<a href = vnd.unilang:ребенок.html>Де́ти</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мой.html>мои́</a>», <span class="example-date">2018</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

***бац.html

***бацилла.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:бацилла.html>баци́лла</a> (22110)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin"><a href = vnd.unilang:latin.html>Latin</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">bacillum</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бацилла.html>баци́лла</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bacílla</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бацилла.html>баци́ллы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бацилла.html>баци́ллы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бацилла.html>баци́лл</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:bacillus.html>bacillus</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:any.html>any</a> bacteria <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:genus.html>genus</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:bacillus.html>Bacillus</a></i></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ци́л<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ла</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нии</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:бактерия.html>бакте́рия</a>» <a href = vnd.unilang:допустимый.html>допусти́мо</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:качество.html>ка́честве</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>существи́тельного</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:специальный.html>специа́льной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ре</a>).

font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:бацилла.html>баци́лла</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:туберкулез.html>туберкулёза</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:иной.html>ино́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:болезнь.html>боле́зни</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́жет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:прекратить.html>прекрати́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жизнь.html>жизнь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:гений.html>ге́ния</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:остановить.html>останови́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:величайший.html>велича́йшую</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мысль.html>мысль</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> возвышеннейшее <a href = vnd.unilang:устремление.html>устремле́ние</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. Л. Франк, «<a href = vnd.unilang:смысл.html>Смысл</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жизнь.html>жи́зни</a>», <span class="example-date">1925</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

***бачок.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:бачок.html>бачо́к</a> (12112)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бак.html>бак</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:бак.html>bak</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о́к</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ók</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бачок.html>бачо́к</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bačók</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бачок.html>бачка́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бачок.html>бачки́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бачок.html>бачко́в</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бак.html>бак</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:бак.html>bak</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:cistern.html>cistern</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:tank.html>tank</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>чо́к</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-бач-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ок</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:баш.html>ба́ша</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:отличный.html>отли́чной</a> кашкарской <a href = vnd.unilang:дурь.html>дури</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>Александр Савельев, «<a href = vnd.unilang:аркан.html>Аркан</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> букмекера», <span class="example-date">2000</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

***башенка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:башенка.html>ба́шенка</a> (15371)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башня.html>ба́шня</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bášnja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башенка.html>ба́шенка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bášenka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башенка.html>ба́шенки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башенка.html>ба́шенки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башенка.html>ба́шенок</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:turret.html>turret</a></li>
<li>mirador</li>
<li>bartisan</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>шен<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-башен-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:смекалка.html>-к</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="историческое">истор.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:солдат.html>солда́т</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:турецкий.html>туре́цких</a> иррегулярных <a href = vnd.unilang:войско.html>во́йск</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:пеший.html>пеший</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:конный.html>ко́нный</a>) XVIII—XIX <a href = vnd.unilang:век.html>веко́в</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:заметить.html>заме́ть</a>, Веруня, <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бы́ло</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мя</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:когда.html>когда́</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:башибузук.html>башибузу́ки</a></span> вырезывали <a href = vnd.unilang:наш.html>на́ши</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пикет.html>пике́ты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>так</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:просто.html>про́сто</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ярославский.html>яросла́вская</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:баба.html>ба́ба</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:огород.html>огоро́де</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:срезать.html>среза́ет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:капустный.html>капу́стные</a> кочни. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9A%D1%83%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80_%D0%98%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Куприн, Александр Иванович"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a>. <li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:грубый.html>гру́бый</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:необузданный.html>необу́зданный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жестокий.html>жесто́кий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>челове́к</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">- <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Вы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:через.html>че́рез</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ширма.html>ши́рму</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:подать.html>пода́йте</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сюда.html>сюда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ходить.html>ходите</a>! — <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сам.html>сам</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:знать.html>зна́ю</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:через.html>че́рез</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ширма.html>ши́рму</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>Не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пугаться.html>пуга́йтесь</a>: <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:башибузук.html>башибузу́к</a></span> какой-нибудь… <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A7%D0%B5%D1%85%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BD_%D0%9F%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Чехов, Антон Павлович"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li>-</li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:разбойник.html>разбо́йник</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:головорез.html>головоре́з</a></li></ol>

***башка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:башка.html>башка</a> (4014)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkic_languages" class="extiw" title="w:Turkic languages"><a href = vnd.unilang:turkic.html>Turkic</a></a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:language.html>language</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:probably.html>probably</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>borrowing</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dative.html>dative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a> attested <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> Kipchak <a href = vnd.unilang:language.html>languages</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tatar_language" class="extiw" title="w:Tatar language"><a href = vnd.unilang:tatar.html>Tatar</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="tt"><a href = vnd.unilang:баш.html>баш</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="tt-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">baş</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:head.html>head</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bashkir_language" class="extiw" title="w:Bashkir language">Bashkir</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ba">башҡа</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ba-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bašqa</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a> <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:head.html>head</a>.1SG.<a href = vnd.unilang:dat.html>Dat</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:initial.html>Initial</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> 17th <a href = vnd.unilang:century.html>century</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:mean.html>meaning</a> '<a href = vnd.unilang:head.html>head</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:large.html>large</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fish.html>fish</a>' <a href = vnd.unilang:imply.html>implies</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:origin.html>origin</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fish.html>fish</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:trade.html>trade</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:south.html>South</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:russia.html>Russia</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:e.html>e</a>.<a href = vnd.unilang:g.html>g</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> Volga <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:don.html>Don</a>).
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башка.html>башка́</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bašká</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башка.html>башки́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башка.html>башки́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башка.html>башо́к</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a><span class="ib-comma">,</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:derogatory.html>derogatory</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:pate.html>pate</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:noggin.html>noggin</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:bonce.html>bonce</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:slang.html>slang</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:word.html>word</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:head.html>head</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:part.html>part</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:body.html>body</a>)
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:подумать.html>поду́май</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свое́й</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:башка.html>башко́й</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:последствие.html>после́дствиях</a>!</i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Podúmaj svojéj <b>baškój</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:o.html>o</a> poslédstvijax!</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:use.html>Use</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:your.html>your</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:noggin.html>noggin</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:think.html>think</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:consequence.html>consequences</a>!</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:баш.html>баш</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка́</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
<a href = vnd.unilang:встречаться.html>Встреча́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>также</a> ненормативный <a href = vnd.unilang:вариант.html>вариа́нт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:схема.html>схе́ме</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:d.html>d</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чередование.html>чередова́нием</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:основа.html>осно́ве</a>: мн. ч. <i>бо́шки, бо́шек, бо́шкам, бо́шками, бо́шках</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:либо.html>ли́бо</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:d.html>d</a>' — <a href = vnd.unilang:дополнительный.html>дополни́тельно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вино.html>ви́н</a>. ед. <i>бо́шку</i>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-башк-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="старинное значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:старина.html>старин</a>.</span> головизна, <a href = vnd.unilang:голова.html>голова́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>большо́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рыба.html>ры́бы</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:выданный.html>Вы́дано</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двор.html>двор</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> росход: просолной <a href = vnd.unilang:рыба.html>ры́бы</a> пол-белуги, <a href = vnd.unilang:осетр.html>осётр</a>, 30 <a href = vnd.unilang:судак.html>судако́в</a>, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:башка.html>башка</a></span> белужья <a href = vnd.unilang:виноградный.html>виногра́дная</a>, 2 <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a> белужьи. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:расходный.html>Расхо́дная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>книга</a> Патриаршего <a href = vnd.unilang:приказ.html>прика́за</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кушанье.html>ку́шаньям</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:подававшийся.html>подава́вшимся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:патриарх.html>патриа́рху</a> Адриану <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:разный.html>ра́зного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чин.html>чи́на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>ли́цам</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сентябрь.html>сентября́</a> 1698 <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:август.html>а́вгуст</a> 1699 <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>., <span class="example-date">19 <a href = vnd.unilang:ноябрь.html>ноября́</a> 1698</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="пренебрежительное">пренебр.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:голова.html>голова́</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>От</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:радио.html>ра́дио</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уже.html>уже́</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:башка.html>башка</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:трещать.html>трещи́т</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кроссворд.html>кроссво́рдов</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глаз.html>глаза́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:темный.html>темно́</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A3%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0,_%D0%A2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%8F%D0%BD%D0%B0_%D0%92%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Устинова, Татьяна Витальевна">Т. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. ***башмачок.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:башмачок.html>башмачо́к</a> (18483)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:баш.html>баш</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ма<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>чо́к</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-башмач-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ок</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:баш.html>баш</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ма<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>чо́к</b>

Зализняка).

Астафьев</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:последний.html>После́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:поклон.html>покло́н</a>», <span class="example-date">1968-1991</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span <h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

</body> 
***башня.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:башня.html>ба́шня</a> (2114)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:first.html>First</a> recorded <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> 1st Pskov <a href = vnd.unilang:manuscript.html>manuscript</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:often.html>Often</a> used <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> 17th <a href = vnd.unilang:century.html>century</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">башта</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bašta</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Italian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:italian.html>Italian</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="it">bastia</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:via.html>via</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Polish language"><a href = vnd.unilang:polish.html>Polish</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="pl">baszta</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Czech_language" class="extiw" title="w:Czech language"><a href = vnd.unilang:czech.html>Czech</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="cs">bašta</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ending.html>ending</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>was</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:influence.html>influenced</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:by.html>by</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:suffix.html>suffix</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ня</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:which.html>which</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:create.html>creates</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>nouns</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:place.html>place</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пашня.html>па́шня</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pášnja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:таможня.html>тамо́жня</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tamóžnja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башня.html>ба́шня</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bášnja</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башня.html>ба́шни</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башня.html>ба́шни</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башня.html>ба́шен</a></b>)
</p>

<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">водонапо́рная <b><a href = vnd.unilang:башня.html>ба́шня</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">vodonapórnaja <b>bášnja</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:water.html>water</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:tower.html>tower</a></span></div></dd>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:баш.html>ба́ш</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ня</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 2*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-башн-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-я</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

(<a href = vnd.unilang:москва.html>Москва</a>)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:многоэтажный.html>многоэта́жный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> одноподъездный <a href = vnd.unilang:дом.html>дом</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жить.html>живу́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>одно́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> 14-этажных <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:башня.html>ба́шен</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рые</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:расположенный.html>располо́жены</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:практически.html>практи́чески</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:напротив.html>напро́тив</a> Ашхабада. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:разговор.html>Разгово́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:улица.html>у́лице</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:между.html>ме́жду</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мужчина.html>мужчи́ной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:женщина.html>же́нщиной</a>, «2005.04.13»<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; <ol><li><i>действ. прич. <a href = vnd.unilang:наст.html>наст</a>. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:баюкать.html>баю́кать</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol>

</ol>
</body> 
***баян.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:баян.html>бая́н</a> (12367)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> “old joke” <a href = vnd.unilang:sense.html>sense</a> originated <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:joke.html>joke</a> (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_meme" class="extiw" title="w:Internet meme"><a href = vnd.unilang:internet.html>Internet</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:meme.html>meme</a></a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:at.html>at</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external free" href="http://www.anekdot.ru">http://www.anekdot.ru</a> — "<a href = vnd.unilang:хоронить.html>Хорони́ли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:теща.html>тёщу</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:порвать.html>порва́ли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:баян.html>бая́на</a>" (<a href = vnd.unilang:when.html>when</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:we.html>we</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:bury.html>buried</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:my.html>my</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:mother-in-law.html>mother-in-law</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:we.html>we</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:break.html>broke</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:accordion.html>accordions</a>).
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баян.html>бая́н</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">baján</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баян.html>бая́на</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баян.html>бая́ны</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баян.html>бая́нов</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>я́н</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-баян-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***баянист.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:баянист.html>баяни́ст</a> (27732)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баянист.html>баяни́ст</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bajaníst</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баянист.html>баяни́ста</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баянист.html>баяни́сты</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:баянист.html>баяни́стов</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">баяни́стка</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>bayan <a href = vnd.unilang:player.html>player</a>; bayanist</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:internet.html>Internet</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slang.html>slang</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:poster.html>poster</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:joke.html>jokes</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ни́ст</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-баян-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ист</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***бдевший.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:бдевший.html>бде́вший</a> (25437)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бдевший.html>бде́вший</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bdévšij</span>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:бдевший.html>бде́вший</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:действительный.html>Действи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>прича́стие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:прошедший.html>проше́дшего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.

***бдение.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:бдение.html>бде́ние</a> (23930)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бдение.html>бде́ние</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">bdénije</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бдение.html>бде́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бдение.html>бде́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бдение.html>бде́ний</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:vigil.html>vigil</a>, wakefulness
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">всено́щное <b><a href = vnd.unilang:бдение.html>бде́ние</a></b></i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">vsenóščnoje <b>bdénije</b></i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:all-night.html>all-night</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:vigil.html>vigil</a></span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>бде́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-бд-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ениj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="религиозное">религ.</span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:православный.html>Правосла́вной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:церковь.html>це́ркви</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:церковный.html>церко́вная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:служба.html>слу́жба</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:начинающийся.html>начина́ющаяся</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:продолжающийся.html>продолжа́ющаяся</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ночной.html>ночно́е</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мя</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:полночь.html>по́лночь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:начаться.html>начало́сь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всех</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:церковь.html>церква́х</a> всенощное <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:бдение.html>бде́ние</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:утро.html>у́тром</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обедня.html>обе́дня</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:молебен.html>моле́бном</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:колокольный.html>колоко́льном</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:звон.html>зво́не</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9F%D1%83%D1%88%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Пушкин, Александр Сергеевич"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. Пушкин</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:история.html>История</a> Петра: <a href = vnd.unilang:подготовительный.html>Подготови́тельные</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:текст.html>те́ксты</a>», <span class="example-date">1835—1836</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>
